sentences.en: C . O . P . D . is a new name for emphysema and chronic bronchitis.
sentences.cn: 是对肺气肿和慢性支气管炎的新称.

sentences.en: Centaury eases cough, bronchitis, inflammation of liver and eye.
sentences.cn: 咳嗽 、 支气管炎 、 肝脏及眼睛发炎有抑制功效.

sentences.en: He was in bed with bronchitis.
sentences.cn: 他患支气管炎卧病在床。

sentences.en: He was suffering from chronic bronchitis.
I ended up with bronchitis and no voice.
sentences.cn: 结果我得了支气管炎，不能说话了。

sentences.en: Mexican healers use chocolate to treat bronchitis and insect bites.
sentences.cn: 墨西哥医生用巧克力医治支气管炎和蚊虫叮咬.

sentences.en: Newcastle Disease ( ND ) and chicken Infectious Bronchitis ( IB ) are both serious infectious diseases.
sentences.cn: 鸡新城疫 ( NewcasttleDisease,ND ) 和鸡传染性支气管炎 ( InfectiousBronchitis, IB ) 是鸡的主要呼吸道传染病,严重危害养鸡业的发展.

sentences.en: Past medical history included hypertension, insulin - dependent diabetes mellitus and chronic bronchitis.
sentences.cn: 既往史包括:高血压 、 胰岛素依赖型糖尿病和慢性气管炎.

sentences.en: Paul was laid up with an attack of bronchitis.
sentences.cn: 保罗支气管炎发作,病倒了.

sentences.en: Paul was rather a delicate boy, subject to bronchitis.
sentences.cn: 保罗是个相当娇弱的孩子, 容易患支气管炎.

sentences.en: She had feared she was going down with pneumonia or bronchitis.
sentences.cn: 她担心会得肺炎或支气管炎。

sentences.en: Smoking sets up irritation in the throat and the bronchitis passages.
sentences.cn: 抽烟刺激喉咙并会引起支气管炎.

sentences.en: The productive cough of chronic bronchitis is often not regarded as abnormal.
sentences.cn: 慢性支气管炎的咳痰往往不被认为异常.

sentences.en: This is termed " chronic or recurrent mucopurulent bronchitis. "
sentences.cn: 这称为 “ 慢性或复发性粘液脓性支气管炎. ”

sentences.en: Your wheezing breathing suggests asthma or bronchitis.
sentences.cn: 你的哮喘显示你可能患有气喘病或支气管炎.

words.tran_cn: [内科][药] 支气管扩张剂；支气管扩张器

trans.tran_en: an illness that affects your bronchial tubes and makes you cough
